post: SELECT * FROM detail_type_of_procedure WHERE iddetail_type_of_procedure = ? AND erased = FALSE
SELECT * FROM empty_poll WHERE name = ? AND description = ? AND type = ? AND erased = FALSE
get: SELECT ep.idempty_poll, ep.iddetail_type_of_procedure, ep.name, ep.description, ep.type, ep.create_date, ep.erased FROM empty_poll ep INNER JOIN detail_type_of_procedure dtop ON dtop.iddetail_type_of_procedure = ep.iddetail_type_of_procedure WHERE ep.erased = FALSE AND dtop.erased = FALSE
SELECT * FROM question_group WHERE idempty_poll = ? AND erased = FALSE
SELECT * FROM question_subgroup WHERE idquestion_group = ? AND erased = FALSE
SELECT * FROM question WHERE idquestion_subgroup = ? AND erased = FALSE ORDER BY question
SELECT DISTINCT idtype_of_answer FROM question WHERE idquestion in (?)
SELECT DISTINCT * FROM type_of_answer WHERE idtype_of_answer = ? AND erased = FALSE
SELECT DISTINCT * FROM answer WHERE idtype_of_answer = ? AND erased = FALSE
getId: SELECT ep.idempty_poll, ep.iddetail_type_of_procedure, ep.name, ep.description, ep.type, ep.create_date, ep.erased FROM empty_poll ep INNER JOIN detail_type_of_procedure dtop ON dtop.iddetail_type_of_procedure = ep.iddetail_type_of_procedure WHERE ep.erased = FALSE AND dtop.erased = FALSE AND  ep.idempty_poll = ?
put: SELECT * FROM detail_type_of_procedure WHERE iddetail_type_of_procedure = ? AND erased = FALSE
UPDATE empty_poll SET ? WHERE idempty_poll = ? AND erased = FALSE
delete: UPDATE empty_poll SET erased = TRUE WHERE idempty_poll = ? AND erased = FALSE
